title: The Manufacture of gas
brief_description: A description of gas manufacture showing all stages from the raw material, coal, to the storage of finished product in gas-holders. Shows also the extraction of by-products such as coke, tar, benzol, dyes and disinfectants. The film stresses the economy of gas manufacture compared with the burning of coal in fireplaces or the generation of electricity using coal as raw material.
